title: Topic 001 Question 824
body: A company is running workloads for multiple departments within a single VPC. The company needs to be able to bill each department for its resource usage.
Which action should the company take to accomplish this goal with the LEAST operational overhead?
options: Add a department tag to each resource and configure cost allocation tags.
Move each department resource to its own VPC.
Move each department resource to its own AWS account.
Use AWS Organizations to get a billing report for each department.
